root['Desc'].new_value: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by [12|24]%. When the wearer's memosprite uses an ability on any ally target, increases all ally targets' DMG dealt by [8|16]%, lasting for 3 turn(s).
root['Desc'].old_value: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by [12|24]%. When the wearer's memosprite uses an ability on ally targets, increases all ally targets' DMG dealt by [8|16]%, lasting for 3 turn(s).
